data.name: Doggo
data.detailed_description:
Follow Doggo on his quest to find his Human so he can finally go back to sleep.
In this light-hearted platforming adventure you will play as "Doggo", a Jack Russel whose only passion in life is to eat and sleep.
Doggo's life gets completely turned upside down when his "Human" misteriously disappears.

Explore Doggo city's various location, meet other Doggos and collaborate to achieve your purpose: find your human so you can finally go back to sleep.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8
  • Processor: Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Graphics: Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
